item.title: CVE-2024-43256|2024-08-19T17:25:20.810Z -- nouthemes -- leopard%20-%20wordpress%20offload%20media
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in nouthemes Leopard - WordPress offload media allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Leopard - WordPress offload media: from n/a through 2.0.36.
